titles.title: A resolution recognizing the 50th anniversary of North Mississippi Rural Legal Services in Oxford, Mississippi.
A resolution recognizing the 50th anniversary of North Mississippi Rural Legal Services in Oxford, Mississippi.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

bill.summary: Recognizes the 50th anniversary of North Mississippi Rural Legal Services in Oxford, Mississippi.
